PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: Radio Rasclat was originally initialised for the tour of the Kunsthochschule Kassel under the name Radio Rundgang as a project by Domenik Töfflinger. During the opening hours we streamed live music from the basement of the basic class Visual Communication. This radio gives our artists/DJs a platform to try out and play.
OPEN_SOURCE_DESC: This radio-web-app is open source and based on Angular. Feel free to open an issue or submit a contribution on
